title: Symptoms Based Disease Predcition System
description: Facilitates illness identification by inputting symptoms, utilizing ML models for precise predictions, and providing precautions and doctor consultations as necessary.

title: Stock Price Prediction
description: Pioneered LSTM architecture integration into stock price forecasting, leveraging its proficiency in capturing complex long-term patterns in sequential data.

title: Heart Disease Prediction
description: Created a user-friendly GUI enabling input of 13 heart-related metrics such as blood pressure, cholesterol levels for predicting heart disease.
